items.sentence: Tom came to the party with his new girlfriend.
Tom drew a picture of Mary and gave it to her.
Tom invited Mary and me to go skiing with him.
Tom only needs one computer, but he has three.
Tom plans to stay in Boston for several weeks.
Tom was desperate to do that, but Mary wasn't.
Are you sure that you want to throw that away?
Tom didn't know that Mary was a ballet dancer.
Let's wait until Tom leaves before we do that.
Tom didn't want to hurt his friend's feelings.
